function.name: generate_history_quiz
function.description: generate ONE multiple choice question on the topic that user chooses, containing 4 answers, with only one correct answer. The first answer returned should be the correct answer. Total, it will return an array of 5 elements. The first element is the question, the second element is the correct answer. The following three elements are three wrong answers

items.description: The first element is the correct answer to the question, and the next three element are the wrong answers
The array contains 4 options as the answer to the question, only the first answer is the right answer

topic.description: A multiple choice question about the specified topic, with four possible answers, and the first answer is the right answer
